mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fvb_message (fromid, toid, content, createdDate, hasRead, conversationid) VALUES (#{fromId}, #{toId}, #{content}, now(), #{hasRead}, #{conversationId})
mapper.select: select count(msgid) from fvb_message where hasRead = 0 and toId = #{userId}
SELECT msgid, fromid, toid, content, createdDate, hasRead, conversationid FROM fvb_message WHERE toid = #{userId} AND hasRead = 0 order by createdDate desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
